author: tabish
msg: Adds a Interface ConcurrentMap to the Concurrent package and implements a basic ConcurrentSTLMap class that is thread safe by locking on its internal mutex for all methods in the class.  Not as well performing as a Java ConcurrentHashMap but better than nothing.
